<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 16"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Focus Ally](/Feats.aspx?ID=2264) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Fortune" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=76" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [PFS Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=50) pg. 53

**Archetype** [Swordmaster](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=33)

**Prerequisites**
[Swordmaster Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1139)

**Trigger**
An adjacent ally fails, but doesn't critically fail, a saving throw against an effect with the [incapacitation](/Traits.aspx?ID=93) trait.

</column>

---

You're so focused on your allies that you can help them to recenter when something would take them out of the fight. Your ally rerolls the failed saving throw. That ally must take the second result.
name: Focus Ally
